job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Spring Valley, NY

cons:
Things are ALWAYS changing. We had doctors coming and leaving we were changing Buildings sometimes. It was a 
little chaotic.  Also the people in charge are not qualified in what they are doing. They are just in charge because they are part of the family business so you have these young girls that act like they know everything that are your bosses.

review_title: Loved my co-workers. Management was a different story.

cons: Management is very biased to certain employees.  It seems that they are more lenient to those who are of a certain religious background.
